channel.title: Trifle, August 2020
channel.description: Daniel Kitson - late night, live. This is an unofficial feed.

item.title: August 4, 2020
item.description:
Originally broadcast on Resonance FM midnight to 1:30 a.m., August 4, 2020

01. Darren Hanlon feat. Shelley Short - We All Cope In Different Ways 02. Haiku Hands - Fashion Model Art 03. Idles - Never Fight A Man With A Perm 04. Jeffrey Lewis - Take It For Granted 05.
